metadata.title: CVE-2024-26599 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: pwm:Fix out-of-bounds access in of_pwm_single_xlate() With args->args_count ==2 args->args[2] is not defined. Actually the flags are contained inargs->args[1].

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-26599` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-26-generic - 6.5.0-26.26
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-26-generic - 6.5.0-26.26
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-26-generic-64k - 6.5.0-26.26
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1017-azure - 6.5.0-1017.17
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1016-gcp - 6.5.0-1016.16
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1012-laptop - 6.5.0-1012.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-26-lowlatency - 6.5.0-26.26.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-26-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-26.26.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1019-oracle - 6.5.0-1019.19
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1019-oracle-64k - 6.5.0-1019.19
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1013-raspi - 6.5.0-1013.16
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1010-starfive - 6.5.0-1010.11
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-26.26').
linux-aws package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1017.17').
linux-gcp package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1016.16').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-laptop package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1012.15').
linux-lowlatency package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-26.26.1').
linux-oracle package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1019.19').
linux-raspi package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1013.16').
linux-starfive package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1010.11').
